mainText:
From such a young age I remember the releases of all the iPods and the
iPhone. Now a high schooler it is hard to believe that one of the most
inspirational figures outside of my own family is gone. Steve Jobs, no
matter what anyone said changed everything and affected the world in so many
ways. He reinvented things over and over and over again. The phone, the
tablet, the computer, the list goes on. May he continue to innovate wherever
he is. Today is a very sad day.
author: Sebastien
